targets.expr: topk(10,max((node_filesystem_size_bytes{fstype=~"ext.?|xfs",tags!=",大数据,"}-node_filesystem_free_bytes{fstype=~"ext.?|xfs",tags!=",大数据,"}) *100/(node_filesystem_avail_bytes {fstype=~"ext.?|xfs",tags!=",大数据,"}+(node_filesystem_size_bytes{fstype=~"ext.?|xfs",tags!=",大数据,"}-node_filesystem_free_bytes{fstype=~"ext.?|xfs"})))by(ecs_cname,instance))
